quotes.quote: Elections are not a beauty contest. It is all about tolerance.
Every election is a sort of advance auction sale of stolen goods.
Free election of masters does not abolish the masters or the slaves.
Winning or losing of the election is less important than strengthening the country.
The people who cast the votes decide nothing. The people who count the votes decide everything.
If voting made any difference they wouldn't let us do it.
An election is a moral horror, as bad as a battle except for the blood; a mud bath for every soul concerned in it.
Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation.
People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war or before an election.
Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men
This election could come down to just a handful of votes. It could come down to just one vote.
The election is not very far off when a candidate can recognize you across the street.
An election is coming. Universal peace is declared, and the foxes have a sincere interest in prolonging the lives of the poultry.
Elections belong to the people. It's their decision. If they decide to turn their back on the fire and burn their behinds, then they will just have to sit on their blisters.
In an election, one needs both hope and audacity.
We elected a man who knows how to build walls when we needed someone who knows how to build bridges.
Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
In elections, the undecided vote is usually the deciding factor.
In elections, you can't tell the outcome until you open the ballot boxes.
To finalize, the purpose of an election is to hear the will of the people, not to fabricate votes.
During an election campaign the air is full of speeches and vice versa.
Elections are about the future.
We deserve elections we can trust.

An election cannot give a country a firm sense of direction if it has two or more national parties which merely have different names, but are as alike in their principals and aims as two peas in the same pod.
An election is an opportunity for a new consensus.
The right of election is the very essence of the constitution.
If elections really changed anything, they would be outlawed.
People are what this election is all about.
Every election is determined by the people who show up.
You cannot win an election without a fight.
